Key Match Events: Ben Lively's start ended abruptly after he was hit in the hip with a line drive, leading to Cleveland's bullpen pitching the remaining 7.0 innings without allowing a single run.
Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer in the top of the sixth inning, giving Cleveland a commanding four-run lead.
Kyle Manzardo recorded two hits in his four at-bats, including an RBI single that gave the Guardians their first run of the night.
